name: THE AMAZING ADVENTURES OF PHILLIP SUNSHINE - PROTOTYPE
name_original: THE AMAZING ADVENTURES OF PHILLIP SUNSHINE - PROTOTYPE
description:
THE AMAZING ADVENTURES OF PHILLIP SUNSHINE is a physics-based runner adventure in wich you have a jetpack that is not so easy to maneuver to help you move through levels since you can't touch the ground, it's a journey in the best style "the floor is lava".

It's a prototype for the first level of The Amazing Adventures of Phillip Sunshine. I tried to make the visuals of the first part of the game something like "Tron". In this demo, you can experience the mechanics of the game and possibly give me some feedback about the overall :) 

I know that's a level that you guys can complete in seconds, but it's just a sneak peek . Thanks everyone.

Controls:

Spacebar - JetPack

W,A,S,D - Moves

F - Rewind

Consider to follow us in our social media to see how the development is going.

https://www.instagram.com/floppystudios/

https://twitter.com/FloppyStudios
